sentences.sContent: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.sCn: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

sentences.sContent: ...A writer should polish his writing repeatedly so as to get closer to perfection...

synos.tran: [机]磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良

phrases.pCn: n. （陆、海军等）过分注意整洁和闪亮的仪容；对服装过分的擦洗

remMethod.val: 波兰人(Polish)产的擦光剂(polish)； 参考： nail polish 指甲油

words.tran: 有礼貌的，客气的；文雅的；上流的；优雅的
磨光器；磨亮的人；[机] 磨光机
擦亮（polish的过去式和过去分词）
[机] 磨光；擦亮；修正（polish的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny
